oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Jimmie Rodgers Memorial Day - 1953-05-26 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of a WSM program featuring recordings of speeches and performances from the Jimmie Rodgers Memorial Day celebration, held in Meridian, Mississippi on May 5, 1953. Program announcer is Grant Turner. Features recordings of speeches by Bill Bruner, A. P. Carter, Nelson King, Hank Snow, Jimmie Davis, Carrie Rodgers, and Elsie McWilliams; and performances by Hank Snow, Jimmie Rodgers Snow, Charlie Walker, Bill Bruner and The Carter Family.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Carter Family
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Nelson King talks -- Nelson King introduces the Carter Family -- A. P. Carter talks -- Anchored In Love (Carter Family) -- A. P. Carter talks (incomplete) -- Nelson King talks -- Eddie Hill introduces Elsie McWilliams -- Elsie McWilliams talks -- Nelson King talks (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Rodgers, Jimmie, 1897-1933; Snow, Hank; Snow, Jimmie Rodgers; Davis, Jimmie, 1899-2000; Rodgers, Carrie; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Tubb, Justin; Hill, Eddie, 1921-1994; Carter Family (Musical group); Carter, A. P. (Alvin Pleasant), 1891-1960; McWilliams, Elsie, 1896-1985; King, Nelson; Bruner, Bill;
